name: Csharp-6-new-language-features
tagline: Presentation slides and source for my C# 6 New Language Features talks.
body:
## C# 6 Language Features
I've been developing a series of talks highlighting the new features in C# 6. If you've been to one of these talks, thanks! You're welcome to grab the slides and source here. Also, I have a series of blog posts [here](http://www.infocraft.net/tag/new-features/) that focuses on expanding on the specific areas of C# 6 that I use on a daily basis.

### Houston .Net User's Group
This event took place at the Microsoft Office in Houston during the monthly [Houston .Net User's Group](http://www.hdnug.org/events_view.aspx?eventid=122).

### Visual Studio 2015 Launch Event
This event took place at the Microsoft Office in Houston. The slides and source code are [here](https://github.com/jmreynolds/CSharp-6-New-Language-Features/tree/VS_Launch_20160209).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
